title: Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash. This behavior is not intended.
OB: When resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: When resizing the window in the vertical direction only, only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted.
SR:
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Resize the window vertically.
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
